name: Mike McCue
overview:
Longtime Silicon Valley entrepreneur Mike McCue founded [Flipboard](http://www.crunchbase.com/company/flipboard) in early 2010, with former Apple iPhone engineer Evan Doll. Together they set out to build a global service that would let people make all of their news, photos, and videos from across social networks accessible from a single place.
In July 2010, they launched Flipboard for iPad: a social magazine that brings people the most informative, entertaining and amazing stories from around the world and from their daily life.
